page.title: 06St. Joseph's School, C'mouth
page.content: {St. Joseph's Roman Catholic School}is built at{Mountain View, Cockermouth. It is a modern primary school about 20 years old. The school has 4 class rooms. They do not have a dining room so they eat their meals in the hall. There are 3 full time teachers and 1 part time. They have 1 cook and 3 helpers.Their cleaning lady is called Patsy Kendall and she sometimes brings in her dog. She cleans the whole school. The{Headmaster}is called{Mr {Mapleton.}He is a new one. They have 71 children in the school and 9 children are leaving in July 1985. The children do not have a uniform but girls have to wear skirts or dresses and boys wear jeans, trousers or shorts.
